flawed_nl_solution:
Jose collected 80 - 14 = <<80-14=70>>70 rocks.
Albert collected 70 + 20 = <<70+20=90>>90 rocks.
Thus, Albert collected 90 - 80 = <<90-80=10>>10 more rocks than Joshua.
#### 10

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 66, not 70. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
